sense.gloss: to decide, to choose, to determine, to make up one's mind, to resolve, to set one's heart on, to settle, to arrange, to set, to appoint, to fix
to clinch (a victory), to decide (the outcome of a match)
to persist in doing, to go through with
to always do, to have made a habit of
to take for granted, to assume
to dress up, to dress to kill, to dress to the nines
to carry out successfully (a move in sports, a pose in dance, etc.), to succeed in doing
to immobilize with a double-arm lock (in sumo, judo, etc.)
to eat or drink something, to take illegal drugs

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちがそこへ↑行↑↓い↓くかどうかを|↑決↑↓き↓める|のは↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑責任↑↓せきにん↓だ。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide whether we will go there or not.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓をするかを|↑決↑↓き↓める|のは↑君↑↓きみ↓↑自身↑↓じしん↓だ。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide what to do.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓をするかを|↑決↑↓き↓める|のは↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑責任↑↓せきにん↓だ。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide what to do.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓をするかを|↑決↑↓き↓める|のはあなたの↑責任↑↓せきにん↓である。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide what to do.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓をするかを|↑決↑↓き↓める|のは、あなた↑次第↑↓しだい↓だ。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide what to do.

sdata.j: する↑事↑↓こと↓を|↑決↑↓き↓める|のはあなたの↑質問↑↓しつもん↓です。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide what to do.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓をするかを|↑決↑↓き↓める|のは、あなたに↑任↑↓まか↓せます。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide what to do.

sdata.j: ↑医者↑↓いしゃ↓が↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑死↑↓し↓ぬ↑時↑↓とき↓↑期↑↓き↓を|↑決↑↓き↓める|のは↑正↑↓ただ↓しいことでしょうか。
sdata.e: Is it right for a doctor to decide when someone should die?

sdata.j: もし↑高↑↓たか↓い↑丘↑↓おか↓が↑Ａ↑↓えい↓から↑Ｂ↑↓びー↓の↑間↑↓ま↓にあれば、↑路線↑↓ろせん↓が↑丘↑↓おか↓を↑越↑↓こ↓えて↑行↑↓い↓くようにさせるか、トンネルで↑丘↑↓おか↓を↑貫↑↓つらぬ↓いて↑行↑↓い↓くようにさせるか、あるいは↑丘↑↓おか↓を↑避↑↓さ↓けて↑迂回↑↓うかい↓↑路↑↓ろ↓をとるようにさせるか|↑決↑↓き↓める|のが↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓となる。
sdata.e: If a high hill stood between A and B, it was important to decide whether the line should climb over it, pierce it with a tunnel, or make a detour to avoid it.

sdata.j: マーケティング↑分科↑↓ぶんか↓↑会↑↓かい↓では、１９９８↑年↑↓ねん↓の↑目標↑↓もくひょう↓と↑方向↑↓ほうこう↓を|↑決↑↓き↓める|ためにフォンコンファレンスを↑行↑↓おこな↓うことをお↑知↑↓し↓らせします。
sdata.e: For your information, the marketing subcommittee is scheduling a phone conference to establish objectives and directions for 1998.
